src:
Jadwal Bola Ahad: Liga 1, Liga Inggris, Liga Italia, Liga Spanyol
02 Nov 2019, 23:41 by Terjemahan, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - Jadwal bola pada Ahad malam hingga Senin dinihari WIB, 4 November 2019, akan menyajikan rangkaian pertandingan dari Liga 1 Indonesia, Liga Inggris, Liga Spanyol, dan Liga Italia.
Inilah jadwal selengkapnya:

Liga 1

Ada dua jadwal Liga 1 pekan ke-26 yang akan bergulir Ahad ini, termasuk aksi juara bertahan Persija Jakarta.15:30 Persija Jakarta vs TIRA Persikabo (Indosiar)18:30 Madura United vs Persipura Jayapura (Indosiar).

Liga Inggris

Jadwal Liga Inggris pekan ke-11 pada malam ini akan menampilkan dua laga menarik.Crystal Palace vs Leicester City | 21:00 WIB (TVRI)Everton vs Tottenham | 23:30 WIB.

Liga Spanyol

Jadwal Liga Spanyol pekan ke-12 akan menghadirkan aksi Granada yang berpeluang naik ke puncak klasemen. Tim ini bisa menggeser Barcelona, yang hanya unggul dua poin, bila mampu menang atas Sociedad. Valladolid vs Mallorca | 18:00 WIBVillarreal vs Ath Bilbao | 20:00 WIBOsasuna vs Alaves | 22:00 WIBLeganes vs Eibar | 00:30 WIB (Ahad dinihari)Celta Vigo vs Getafe | 00:30 WIBGranada vs Real Sociedad | 03:00 WIB.

Liga Italia

Laga menarik AC Milan vs Lazio akan mewarnai rangkaian jadwal Liga Italia pekan ke-11 malam ini:Atalanta vs Cagliari | 18:30 WIBGenoa vs Udinese | 21:00 WIBVerona vs Brescia | 21:00 WIBLecce vs Sassuolo | 21:00 WIBFiorentina vs Parma | 00:00 WIBAC Milan vs Lazio | 02:45 WIB.
text:
Sunday Football Schedule: League 1, English League, Italian League, Spanish League
02 Nov 2019, 23:41 by translations, Nurdin Saleh
TEMPO.CO, Jakarta - The soccer schedule on Sunday night until Monday morning WIB, November 4, 2019, will present a series of matches from the Indonesian League 1, the English League, the Spanish League and the Italian League.
Here is the complete schedule:

League 1

There are two League 1 schedules for Week 26 that will roll on this Sunday, including the action of defending champions Persija Jakarta.15: 30 Persija Jakarta vs TIRA Persikabo (Indosiar) 18:30 Madura United vs Persipura Jayapura (Indosiar).

Premier League

The schedule for the Premier League Week 11 tonight will feature two exciting matches. Crystal Palace vs Leicester City | 21:00 WIB (TVRI) Everton vs Tottenham | 23:30 WIB.

The Spanish league

Week 12 of the Spanish League schedule will bring the action of Granada which has the opportunity to rise to the top of the table. This team can shift Barcelona, who are only two points ahead, if able to win over Sociedad. Valladolid vs Mallorca | 18:00 WIB Villarreal vs Ath Bilbao | 20:00 WIB Osasuna vs Alaves | 22:00 WIBLeganes vs Eibar | 00:30 WIB (Sunday morning) Celta Vigo vs Getafe | 00:30 WIBGranada vs Real Sociedad | 3:00 a.m.

Italian league

AC Milan vs Lazio's exciting match will color the Italian Week 11 schedule: Atalanta vs Cagliari | 18:30 WIB Geneva vs Udinese | 21:00 WIBVerona vs Brescia | 21:00 WIB Lecce vs Sassuolo | 21:00 WIB Fiorentina vs Parma | 00:00 WIBAC Milan vs Lazio | 02:45 WIB.
